Featuring local artworks and handicrafts, air-conditioned room is fitted with deep stone bathtub in opened air and a 40-inch flat-screen TV. Private bathroom comes with Grohe bathroom amenities and hairdryer. View of this room type is limited by the adjacent construction building.

Large room features a sliding door that opens out to a private balcony, fitted with lush hanging garden and deep stone bathtub. A 40-inch flat-screen TV, seating area and personal safe are included. Grohe bathroom amenities are available.

This signature, open-plan suite is a blend of the Old Saigon and modern comforts offering panoramic views of the city skyline. A private balcony is fitted with a lush garden and deep stone bathtub. A 40-inch flat-screen TV and Grohe bathroom amenities are included.
